title: Boosted Photoconversion of SF6 over Defective ZnGa2O4 Nanosheets under Mild Conditions
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00324A, Communication
Shan Zhu, Zhao Yue, Fengxiang Ma, Yin Yue, Wenjia Shi, Feng Zhu, Wenya Fan, Peijin Du, Jinyu Ding
In the context of sulfur hexafluoride (SF6) photoreduction, the impact of defects has been shown to produce contradictory results. To address this, we have chosen to utilize two-dimensional materials as...
